Hello Leticia,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

The Productions Module has been released on your environment.

 

Kindly find attached a user guide documentation for your convenience.

 

I’m also available for a brief session via Teams to walk you through a demo of the Module.

 

If you have any questions or if you need any assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Hello Leticia,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

The Productions Module has been released on your environment.

 

Kindly find attached a user guide documentation for your convenience.

 

I’m also available for a brief session via Teams to walk you through a demo of the Module.

 

If you have any questions or if you need any assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah
